name: kui-shell
description: This is the monorepo for Kui, the hybrid command-line/GUI electron-based Kubernetes tool

scripts.build:electron-for-development: (cd packages/tests && ./bin/corral.sh) && npm run build:configure && npm run compile && for i in plugins/*; do if [ -d $i/node_modules ]; then (cd build/plugins/`basename $i` && rm -rf node_modules && cp -a ../../../$i/node_modules .); fi; done && (cd packages/tests && ./bin/corral.sh)
scripts.postinstall: npm run build:hoist && npm run build:electron-for-development
